Journal - Modern UI framework. It makes your users inquisitive and curious, then seeking.

  • Download via Github
  • Install via NPM

Concept

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Getting Started / Demonstration

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

You can check the demonstration with here.

Layout

Side Navigation * Required

Left navigation with Open / Close toggle available. You can set any static links. Demonstration is here.

          
<nav id="jsi-jnl-navigation" class="jnl-navigation">
  <h1 id="jsi-jnl-navigation__trigger" class="jnl-navigation__title">Lorem Ipsum</h1>

  <ul class="jnl-navigation__list">

    <!-- 'jnl-navigation__list' or 'jnl-navigation__list--bottom' available. -->
    <li class="jnl-navigation__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon jnl-icon--darkbg">account_box</i>
        <span>Menu 1</span>
      </a>
    </li>

    <li class="jnl-navigation__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon jnl-icon--darkbg">book</i>
        <span>Menu 2</span>
      </a>
    </li>

    <li class="jnl-navigation__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon jnl-icon--darkbg">code</i>
        <span>Menu 3</span>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>

  <!-- '--bottom' class would be set it the bottom on navigation. -->
  <ul class="jnl-navigation__list--bottom">
    <li class="jnl-navigation__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon jnl-icon--darkbg">zoom_in</i>
        <span>Menu 99</span>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</nav>

Header* Required

White header. You can set any static links. Demonstration is here.

          
<header class="jnl-layout__header">

  <!-- 'jnl-layout__header__list' or 'jnl-layout__header__list--right' available. -->
  <ul class="jnl-layout__header__list">
    <li class="jnl-layout__header__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon">account_box</i>
        <span>Menu 1</span>
      </a>
    </li>

    <li class="jnl-layout__header__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon">book</i>
        <span>Menu 2</span>
      </a>
    </li>

    <li class="jnl-layout__header__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon">code</i>
        <span>Menu 3</span>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>

  <!-- '--right' class would be set it the right on header. -->
  <ul class="jnl-layout__header__list--right">
    <li class="jnl-layout__header__list__item">
      <a href="#">
        <i class="jnl-icon">zoom_in</i>
        <span>Menu 99</span>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</header>

Footer Optional

Blue Footer. You can set any static links. Demonstration is here.

          
<!-- 'jnl-layout__footer' or 'jnl-layout__footer--center' or 'jnl-layout__footer--right' available. -->
<footer class="jnl-layout__footer--right">
  <nav>
    <ul class="jnl-layout__footer__list">
      <li class="jnl-layout__footer__list__item">
        <a href="#">Lorem ipsum</a>
      </li>
      <li class="jnl-layout__footer__list__item">
        <a href="#">Dolor sit amet</a>
      </li>
      <li class="jnl-layout__footer__list__item">
        <a href="#">Consectetur adipisicing elit</a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </nav>
</footer>

Panes * At least 1 required

Pages list, items list, 850-width contents page available. Demonstration is here.

          
<div class="jnl-layout__contents__pages jsc-jnl-layout__pane">
  <h2 class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__headline">Lorem ipsum</h2>

  <menu class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__toolbar">
    <button>Foo</button>
    <button>Bar</button>
    <button>Buz</button>
  </menu>

  <div class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__list jsc-jnl-layout__contents__pages__list">
    <h3 class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__list__headline">Lorem Ipsum</h3>
    <ul>
      <!-- 'data-pene-href' property is related to 'data-pane-target' property. -->
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-second">Lorem ipsum</a></li>
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-second">Dolor sit amet</a></li>
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-third">Consectetur adipisicing</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

          
        
          
<!-- 'data-pene-target' property would be called from 'data-pane-href' property. -->
<div data-pane-target="demo-pane-second" class="jnl-layout__contents__pages jsc-jnl-layout__pane">
  <h2 class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__headline jsc-layout__pane__headline">Lorem ipsum</h2>

  <menu class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__toolbar">
    <button>Foo</button>
    <button>Bar</button>
    <button>Buz</button>
  </menu>
  <label class="jnl-layout__contents__pages__search">
    <i class="jnl-icon">search</i>
    <!-- 'data-search-ref' property is related to 'data-search-target' property. -->
    <input type="text" placeholder="Type keywords..." data-search-ref="demo-items">
  </label>

  <div class="jnl-layout__contents__items">
    <!-- 'data-search-target' property would called by to 'data-search-ref' property. -->
    <ul data-search-target="demo-items">
      <!-- 'data-pene-href' property is related to 'data-pane-target' property. -->
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-third">
        <label class="jnl-layout__contents__items__label">Lorem</label>
        <strong class="jnl-layout__contents__items__title">Elit sed do</strong>
        <small class="jnl-layout__contents__items__description">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</small>
      </a></li>
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-third">
        <!-- 'jnl-layout__contents__items__label' or 'jnl-layout__contents__items__label--primary' or 'jnl-layout__contents__items__label--success' or 'jnl-layout__contents__items__label--warning' available. -->
        <label class="jnl-layout__contents__items__label--primary">Ipsum</label>
        <label class="jnl-layout__contents__items__label--invalid">Dolor</label>
        <label class="jnl-layout__contents__items__label--success">Sitamet</label>
        <strong class="jnl-layout__contents__items__title">Eiusmod tempor</strong>
        <small class="jnl-layout__contents__items__description">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</small>
      </a></li>
      <li><a data-pane-href="demo-pane-third">
        <strong class="jnl-layout__contents__items__title">Incididunt ut labore</strong>
        <small class="jnl-layout__contents__items__description">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</small>
      </a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

          
        
          
<!-- 'data-pene-target' property would be called from 'data-pane-href' property. -->
<article data-pane-target="demo-pane-third" class="jnl-layout__contents__article jsc-jnl-layout__pane">
  <h2 class="jnl-layout__contents__article__headline jsc-layout__pane__headline">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</h2>

  <div class="jnl-layout__contents__article__sections">
    <section class="jnl-layout__contents__article__sections__section">
      <h3 class="jnl-layout__contents__article__sections__section__headline">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</h3>
      <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</p>
    </section>
  </div>
</article>

Styles

Typography

Examples
h1

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
h2

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
h3

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
h4

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
h5
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
h6
The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
p

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
strong The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
em The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
small The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

Icons

You can use all of icons in Material Icons by Google MATERIAL DESIGN. You can change color / size as you like via CSS.

Examples
attachment 
                    
<i class="jnl-icon">attachment</i>
cloud 
                    
<i class="jnl-icon">cloud</i>
file_download 
                    
<i class="jnl-icon">file_download</i>
file_upload 
                    
<i class="jnl-icon">file_upload</i>
folder 
                    
<i class="jnl-icon">folder</i>

Colours

Examples
This is normal. 
                    
<p>
  This is normal
</p>
This is midpriority. 
                    
<p class="jnl-font--midpriority">
  This is mid-priority
</p>
This is lowpriority. 
                    
<p class="jnl-font--lowpriority">
  This is low-priority
</p>
This is primary. 
                    
<p class="jnl-font--primary">
  This is primary
</p>
This is success. 
                    
<p class="jnl-font--success">
  This is success
</p>
This is warning. 
                    
<p class="jnl-font--warning">
  This is warning
</p>

Buttons

Examples 
                    
<button class="jnl-button">
  This is default button.
</button>
                    
                  
                    
<button class="jnl-button--primary">
  This is primary button.
</button>
                    
                  
                    
<button class="jnl-button--warning">
  This is warning button.
</button>
                    
                  
                    
<button class="jnl-button--disabled">
  This is disabled button.
</button>

Whereever you can set buttons horizontaly with jnl-buttons-list class.

 
                  
<ul class="jnl-buttons-list">
  <li><button class="jnl-button">This is default button.</button></li><li><button class="jnl-button">This is default button.</button></li><li><button class="jnl-button">This is default button.</button></li>
</ul>

Form Field - Text Fields

Examples
Input, default 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input, default</legend>
  <input type="text" value="Text Input" class="jnl-formfield__input">
</fieldset>
Input, --s 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input, --s</legend>
  <input type="text" value="Text Input" class="jnl-formfield__input--s">
</fieldset>
Input, --l 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input, --l</legend>
  <input type="text" value="Text Input" class="jnl-formfield__input--l">
</fieldset>
Input, --xl 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input, --xl</legend>
  <input type="text" value="Text Input" class="jnl-formfield__input--xl">
</fieldset>

Examples

  <textarea class="jnl-formfield__textarea">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.</textarea>
</fieldset>

Form Field - Selectbox

Examples
Select 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Select</legend>

  <!-- <select> tag is needed to wrapped by <span class="..."></span> the below. -->
  <span class="jnl-formfield__select jsc-jnl-formfield__select">
    <select>
      <option value=""></option>
      <option value="option-1st">option-1st</option>
      <option value="option-2nd">option-2nd</option>
      <option value="option-3rd">option-3rd</option>
    </select>
  </span>
</fieldset>
Select 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Select</legend>

  <!-- <select> tag is needed to wrapped by <span class="..."></span> the below. -->
  <span class="jnl-formfield__select--s jsc-jnl-formfield__select">
    <select>
      <option value=""></option>
      <option value="option-1st">option-1st</option>
      <option value="option-2nd">option-2nd</option>
      <option value="option-3rd">option-3rd</option>
    </select>
  </span>
</fieldset>
Select 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Select</legend>

  <!-- <select> tag is needed to wrapped by <span class="..."></span> the below. -->
  <span class="jnl-formfield__select--l jsc-jnl-formfield__select">
    <select>
      <option value=""></option>
      <option value="option-1st">option-1st</option>
      <option value="option-2nd">option-2nd</option>
      <option value="option-3rd">option-3rd</option>
    </select>
  </span>
</fieldset>
Select 
                    
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Select</legend>

  <!-- <select> tag is needed to wrapped by <span class="..."></span> the below. -->
  <span class="jnl-formfield__select--xl jsc-jnl-formfield__select">
    <select>
      <option value=""></option>
      <option value="option-1st">option-1st</option>
      <option value="option-2nd">option-2nd</option>

Form Field - Checkboxes / Radio Buttons

Examples
Input Checkbox 
                  
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input Checkbox</legend>

  <ul class="jnl-formfield__checkboxes">
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__checkbox jsc-jnl-formfield__checkbox">
        <input type="checkbox" value="Checkbox Input">
        <span>Checkbox Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__checkbox jsc-jnl-formfield__checkbox">
        <input type="checkbox" value="Checkbox Input">
        <span>Checkbox Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__checkbox jsc-jnl-formfield__checkbox">
        <input type="checkbox" value="Checkbox Input">
        <span>Checkbox Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
  </ul>
</fieldset>
Input Radio 
                  
<fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
  <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input Radio</legend>

  <ul class="jnl-formfield__radios">
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__radio jsc-jnl-formfield__radio">
        <input type="radio" value="Radio Input">
        <span>Radio Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__radio jsc-jnl-formfield__radio">
        <input type="radio" value="Radio Input">
        <span>Radio Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
    <li>
      <label class="jnl-formfield__radio jsc-jnl-formfield__radio">
        <input type="radio" value="Radio Input">
        <span>Radio Input</span>
      </label>
    </li>
    
  </ul>
</fieldset>

Form Field - File Attachment

Examples
Input File add add file 
                  
  <fieldset class="jnl-formfield">
    <legend class="jnl-formfield__label">Input File</legend>
    <span class="jnl-formfield__file__appearance">
      <input type="file" value="File Input" class="jnl-formfield__file jsc-jnl-formfield__file__input">
      <span class="jsc-jnl-formfield__file__text"><i class="jnl-icon">add</i> add file</span>
    </span>
  </fieldset>

Table

th in thead td in thead td in thead td in thead
th in tbody td in tbody td in tbody td in tbody
th in tbody td in tbody td in tbody td in tbody
th in tbody td in tbody td in tbody td in tbody
th in tfoot td in tfoot td in tfoot td in tfoot 
          
<table class="jnl-table">
  <!-- for each <th> and <td>, classes 'jnl-table__cell--left' or 'jnl-table__cell--center' or 'jnl-table__cell--right' available. -->

  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>th in thead</th>
      <td>td in thead</td>
      <td>td in thead</td>
      <td>td in thead</td>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <th>th in tbody</th>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
    </tr><tr>
      <th>th in tbody</th>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
    </tr><tr>
      <th>th in tbody</th>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
      <td>td in tbody</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
  <tfoot>
    <tr>
      <th>th in tfoot</th>
      <td>td in tfoot</td>
      <td>td in tfoot</td>
      <td>td in tfoot</td>
    </tr>
  </tfoot>
</table>

Toasts

Four different toasts available. Demonstration is here.

          
<ul class="jnl-toasts">
  <li class="jnl-toast jsc-jnl-toast">
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
  </li>

  <li class="jnl-toast--information jsc-jnl-toast">
    <i class="jnl-icon">info</i>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
  </li>

  <li class="jnl-toast--success jsc-jnl-toast">
    <i class="jnl-icon">check_circle</i>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
  </li>

  <li class="jnl-toast--warning jsc-jnl-toast">
    <i class="jnl-icon">warning</i>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
  </li>
</ul>
